hadiths.text: Abu Huraira (Allah be pleased with him) reported:There came a person demanding a camel from Allah's Messenger (ﷺ). He (the Holy Prophet) said: Give him (the camel) of that age or of more mature age, and said: Best among you is one who is best in clearing off the debt

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنِ اسْتَسْلَفَ شَيْئًا فَقَضَى خَيْرًا مِنْهُ وَ " خَيْرُكُمْ أَحْسَنُكُمْ قَضَاءً "
chapter.eng-name: It is permissible to lend animals and it is recommended to pay in full, giving something better than that which ts owed
